comment.body: There was one, as far as i remember...a pedestrian bridge...

Yup. It’s called Schwedler Brücke. They closed the bridge in 2011 and then tore it down. The city of Frankfurt put aside money to rebuild it but so far they have not been able to find a company willing to rebuild it. The city is hopeful that a company can be found; currently the construction work is being tendered. If a company is found them they expect work to start summer 2025.

https://www.hessenschau.de/tv-sendung/schwedlerbruecke-in-frankfurt-soll-restauriert-werden,video-204908.html

There is a Wikipedia Page. It is called Schwedler Bridge. Had to be closed in 2011 but there are still plannings to rebuild it some day [Wikipedia](https://de.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schwedlerbr%C3%BCcke)

[Schwedlerbrücke](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schwedlerbrücke). It was a pedestrian bridge that would connect Schwedlerstrasse with Ostpark.

Designed by Johann Wilhelm Schwedler and constructed in 1910. Schwedler was an important 19th Century German engineer and architect who also designed the roof of the Frankfurt Hauptbahnhof.

It was closed in 2011, and partially deconstructed in 2016. The missing pieces are still there, sitting on the ground. Plans to rebuild and restore the bridge have been repeatedly postponed since then, but the city still intends to follow through in the near future.
I live close to it and yes it’s not there anymore. Would be amazing if they build again. My work distance would shorten in half.
was that the famous "andreas türk" bridge?! ![gif](emote|free_emotes_pack|feels_bad_man)
They’re supposed to renovate it in next year… maybe this time it will actually happen. The bridge to the Ostpark would be fantastic there.
I really hope they do build

Nein, das mit Andreas ist angeblich auf der Kaiserleibrücke passiert (Übergang FFM - Offenbach - Autos). Gibt noch eine weitere (Stau-)Brücke, aber die war es nicht. Gab mal ne Zeit, da sind tatsächlich einige so ins MTW/Robert Johnson rüber, als die (Szene-)Bars in der Hanauer noch (sehr) gut liefen.
war das nicht irgendwo vom o25 (ostparkstraße) richtung vinyl bar?
keine ahnung. ich habs googeln müssen.
